name: Rokoan Arts
summary: Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa.
description:
Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa. You can cast speak with animals and status as primal innate spells once per day each.Traits

Strix: Winged humanoids, most of whom live in and around Cheliax.
